message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $200.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
I understand that $200 might be a bit steep, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $180, which is the lowest I'm willing to go. It's still a great deal, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $180 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $150 for the product. Can you consider that?
